snippet: "Interviews Before Execution" has become a sensation in Henan Province, located in central China, with a reported 40 million viewers tuning in Saturday nights to watch the final anguished moments of death-row prisoners and their families. Cue the...
abstract: "Interviews Before Execution" has become a sensation in Henan Province, located in central China, with a reported 40 million viewers tuning in Saturday nights to watch the final anguished moments of death-row prisoners and their families. Cue the firing squad.

headline.main: On a New TV Show in China, Cue the Firing Squad
